attributes.action: urge Hampshire County Council to retain the Tower Arts Centre Winchester in its current form and with the present management and staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Tower Arts Centre is a popular and well used venue offering music, theatre, art classes etc. appealing to a wide range of people. It caters for all ages and varied tastes, with special events for children and young people, and is excellently run by the centre director John Tellet and his friendly and efficient staff. 

There are proposals to fragment the services offered at the Tower by giving control of the building to the adjacent large secondary school and utilising a new city centre venue. This will put at risk the unique atmosphere of this listed former water tower which is highly valued by audiences and artists alike.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "urge Hampshire County Council to retain the Tower Arts Centre Winchester in its current form and with the present management and staff."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
